alert.note: Alert for Central Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 6:02PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Marion County through 645 PM EDT... At 602 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Weir, or near The Villages. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Weirsdale, Ocklawaha, Lake Weir, Belleview and Summerfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
